data.name: Orijen Original
data.description: Rich in protein and free of any grains or plant protein concentrates, ORIJEN Original features unmatched inclusions of free-run chicken and turkey, wild-caught fish, and cage-free eggs. Mother Nature did it best, and we're following her lead with this nutrient-dense, delicious, ancestral diet that dogs are evolved to eat. From Dachshunds to Great Danes, all dogs possess a biological need for a diet rich and varied in fresh whole animal ingredients. With 38 % richly nourishing protein, and 20 % carbohydrates to nourish dogs of all life stages according to their evolutionary and biological needs. Free of rendered poultry meals, 1 / 3 of the meats are from dehydrated chicken and turkey(air - dried at low temperature from fresh meat) for a concentrated source of nourishing protein. Unmatched by any other food, 2 / 3 of the meats are FRESH(refrigerated, without preservatives) or RAW(flash - frozen, without preservatives), including the top 10 meat ingredients. Nutrient - dense WholePrey ratios of fresh meat, organs, cartilage and bones plus fresh whole fish and fresh whole eggs provide a natural source of virtually every nutrient your dog needs. Infusions of gently freeze - dried liver enhance flavor and palatability naturally, making ORIJEN deliciously tasty, even for fussy eaters.

data.name: CANIDAE All Life Stages Multi - Protein Formula
data.description: Make mealtimes easy, tasty and nutritious with the CANIDAE All Life Stages Multi-Protein Formula Dry Dog Food. This vet-formulated recipe is speciﬁcally designed for dogs of all breeds, sizes and ages. It features premium ingredients and optimum protein, and is complete free of corn, wheat and soy for the wholesome nutrition your dog deserves. This all-in-one approach to feeding makes mealtime for multi-dog households much simpler than dealing with multiple bags of different foods. Single-dog households will also enjoy the beneﬁts—no more guessing or switching based on your dog’s age, breed, or size. One bag is all you need for the great tasting nutrition your furry friend loves.

data.name: Taste of the Wild High Prairie Grain-Free
data.description: Nourish your canine companion with the balanced diet nature intended with Taste of the Wild High Prairie Grain-Free Dry Dog Food. Formulated with novel proteins including buffalo and bison, this grain-free recipe includes peas and sweet potatoes that deliver the highly-digestible energy your active pup needs, along with natural antioxidant support from real fruits and vegetables and dried chicory root for prebiotic support and healthy digestion. Essential minerals are chelated with amino acids to optimize their absorption and ensure maximum benefit, for complete and balanced nutrition with a taste of the wild your furry friend constantly craves!

product_reviews.review_body: My 10 year old setter mix Lucy, sometimes just won't eat. She's spunky and healthy and has always been fed high quality dry dog food, but when she went more than a day without showing interest in eating, I decided to add a different food with my regular Chewy order. The reviews on this dog food were all very positive so I tried this one. She loves it. That's all I wanted. I'm very satisfied with this food and will continue to use it for my picky Lucy.

product_reviews.review_title: Picky Eaters Will Eat Taste of the Wild
product_reviews.review_body: We have 3 dogs, a small mixed terrier-type about 22 lbs., a Golden Doodle about 95 lbs. and a Bernese Mountain Dog about 100+ lbs. Our picky eater is our Golden Doodle. I have gone through several brands of dry dog food trying to find what everybody likes. (I always serve the dry kibbles with canned meat.) Anyway, Cody, the Golden Doodle, will eat Taste of the Wild so that's what I buy for everybody.

My 6 year old Chessy has been on the same dry food for at least 4 years when, due to the pandemic, his autoship did not arrive on time. We went to a local store and tried this Taste of the Wild dry food as an interim solution and we are really glad we did - He loves this new food. We even use it as treats when we go for walks with him. I'm sure he would agree that this is the best thing that has happened to him in a long time. Try it for your dog!!!

Vet told us our 2 year old German shepherd was underweight. She looked thin and never really wanted to eat regularly. Decided on this food for the high protien, and it has been great! She has filled out so much, and her coat even looks better! She’s eating regularly now and seems to really love this food.

data.name: Blue Buffalo Homestyle Recipe Chicken Dinner with Garden Vegetables & Brown Rice
data.description: Get your furry friend to keep on cluckin’ for Blue Buffalo Homestyle Recipe Natural Adult Wet Dog Food. Paw-fect for your pupper pal, this irresistibly tasty wet food is made using only the finest natural ingredients. It starts with high-quality protein from tender chunks of chicken, packed with garden fruits and veggies, then enhanced with vitamins and minerals. Formulated to support lean muscle mass and the other nutritional needs of your grown-up guy, this pate-style dog food is made with wholesome ingredients that do not contain any by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.

product_reviews.review_body: I have purchased can food before and the cans in the carton were often really dented. so I stopped. I am trying again but still seeing some issue I check the cans after opening and the dent does not seem to go all the way thru. It would be aopreciated if this could be prevented

My dog was sick a few months back and the vet had him eating some prescription wet and dry food. After he got better he did not really enjoy his old dry food anymore. I tried a few spoonfuls of this Blue Buffalo Homestyle Recipe on his dry food and he loved it! He actually dances when I go to put it on his dry food. I have also used the Turkey and Beef flavors he he loved those also. Chewy also has a great price on the cases.

Hi, I am Misty, the dog. I am a picky eater, the right of every teen age girl. My Mom has been adding this yummy food to my dry food. I love the combo & do not leave my food for hours in my bowl. My Mom told me that she was looking for a food without meat byproducts and was not grain free.
It was nice to get a discount for her to have Blue Buffalo to try and she really loves it.

data.name: Royal Canin Feline Health Nutrition Thin Slices in Gravy Variety Pack
data.description: At around 4 months old, a kitten's growth rate changes. With rising energy levels, developing immune and digestive systems, growing bones and muscles, and emerging teeth, older kittens have different needs than they did as a baby cat (1-4 months old). Royal Canin Thin Slices in Gravy Wet Food delivers the nutritional precision your kitten needs to reach their most magnificent potential. Thin Slices in Gravy wet food formulated for the second stage of kittenhood(between 4 months to 1 year); for younger cats, try Royal Canin Mother & Babycat. Made with the optimal ratio of protein, fats, and carbohydrates to meet the nutritional energy needs of a maturing kitten 's playful energy. An innovative blend of antioxidants supports a kitten 's developing immune system defenses as they continue to grow. Promotes healthy growth and digestion with digestible proteins, fiber, and prebiotics. Small, thin slices in gravy texture is easy for a new kitten to eat as they transition to solid foods; a perfect complement to Royal Canin Kitten Dry Kibble

data.name: Simple Solution Extra Large
data.description: Housebreaking a dog, or caring for an incontinent pet isn't always easy. Simple Solution Extra Large Dog Training Pads will help take the stress and mess out of your life. The attractant will make sure your pup finds the right spot to go, and our InstaShield Technology neutrilizes odors while keeping it all contained up to 7 cups of liquid! EASY DOES IT - Simple Solution Extra Large Dog Training Pads are 100 % more absorbent than our original economy pads.Imagine how easy it will be to house train a puppy with a pad that can absorb that much liquid. LARGER IS BETTER - These training pads are 28 x 30 inches, making them 60 % larger than standard pads.That means little dogs can use them multiple times before you have to change them, and bigger dogs will have all the room they need to do their work. WE HAVE THE TECHNOLOGY - Simple Solution training pads contain InstaShield Technology.We developed this technology to contain more liquid, 7 cups worth, while neutralizing unpleasant odors. WORKING SMARTER - Our 3 - in -1 Attractant works in a systematic way to entice your dog to approach the pad, engage with the pad, and finally encourage your dog to use the pad not your floor. KNOW AT A GLANCE - Wouldn 't it be nice if there was some way to know for sure that it is time to change the pad? Well, there is! The Wetness Indicator turns teal to let you know that your furbaby has successfully used the pad.

data.name: Purina Pro Plan LIVECLEAR Rinse Free Allergen Reducing Shampoo
data.description: Enjoy the time you spend with your cat to the fullest when you use Purina Pro Plan LIVECLEAR Rinse Free Allergen Reducing dry shampoo for cats. Our foam cat shampoo has been shown to reduce the allergens in cat hair and dander safely and simply. This hypoallergenic shampoo is 99.8% natural and pH-balanced and features a fast-acting, easy-to-use cleansing foam. A pump dispenser makes application quick and convenient, and the waterless cat shampoo formula means there's no need to rinse. To target cat allergens at the source, also look to Purina Pro Plan LIVECLEAR dry cat food. This revolutionary formula, the first of its kind, uses a key protein in eggs to neutralize a common allergen in cat saliva, Fel D 1. It's been shown to reduce cat allergens in hair and dander by an average of 47% starting in the third week of daily feeding. To get the upper hand on cat allergens in your home, turn to the Purina Pro Plan LIVECLEAR line of dry cat shampoo and food. Rinse - free, dry shampoo for cats shown to reduce the allergens in cat hair and dander. Hypoallergenic shampoo formula cleanses gently and effectively 99.8 % natural shampoo formulated to meet your ingredient expectations. LIVECLEAR dry cat shampoo is pH balanced. data.name: Nature's Miracle Just For Cats Litter Box Odor Destroyer Unscented Spray
data.description: Cats appreciate a fresh-smelling litter box, and so do you. Nature's Miracle Just For Cats Litter Box Odor Destroyer works to eliminate tough litter box odors and remove airborne, fabric and hard-surface odors. Unlike many products that may simply mask unpleasant pet odors, this formula reacts with embedded litter box odors, destroying them on contact. Spray in the air or on surfaces such as litter boxes, litter box mats or anywhere your pet goes. The unscented formula is safe for use around pets and home when used as directed. Use with any litter substrate, including clay, corn, corn cob, paper and more.For use on airborne odors, liberally spray into the air. For fabric odors, spray lightly and evenly onto fabric surfaces until slightly damp (not recommended for use on silk or leather). For use on hard surfaces, lightly spray until slightly damp and wipe up excess with cloth. LITTER BOX ODOR ELIMINATOR: Breakthrough formula permanently and instantly eliminates cat odors. ADVANCED, TRIPLE - ACTION FORMULA: Eliminates airborne, fabric and hard - surface odors. FRAGRANCE FREE: Spray in the air or on surfaces - leaves no scent behind. SAFE FOR PETS AND HOME: Safe for use around pets and home when used as directed and will not cause litter to clump. TRUSTED BRAND: From the maker of Nature 's Miracle products, the pet stain and odor removing brand you trust because it works
